content: {"name": "Self Help Inc.-Boston", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit\" https://www.mass.gov/massachusetts-summer-ebt-program\nSHI staff can assist you in applying for SNAP benefits, submitting required documentation, completing your re-certification, and more. Please contact them to set up a phone appointment at 508-588-0447 or email them at snap@selfhelpinc.org (someone will get back to you within 48hrs, as they have reduced staff)", "email": "", "url": "https://selfhelpinc.org/program-services/snap/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(508) 588-0447", "type": "voice"}]}
